sentence.text: Among the available genomic studies, the key findings in Africa were variants in positive regulation of transcription, DNA-templated (P193H), regulation of histone methylation 677TT, and regulation of histone methylation 1298CC that were associated with atrial septal defect, ventricular septal defect (VSD), Tetralogy of Fallot (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II), and patent ductus arteriosus phenotypes and 22q.11 deletion, which is associated with negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
